resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105879</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105879</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205342</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">What Makes the News?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was macht die Schlagzeilen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que fait les nouvelles ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que faz a notícia?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa fa le notizie?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό που κάνει τις ειδήσεις;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué hace las noticias?</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will be guided to think critically about the news, develop their own criteria to assess the elements of a newsworthy story, collect data on the local news and create their own news story.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer werden, um an die Nachrichten kritisch zu 
denken, ihre eigenen Kriterien zu entwickeln geführt, um die Elemente
einer berichtenswerten Geschichte festzusetzen, Daten bezüglich der 
lokalen Nachrichten zu sammeln und ihre eigene Nachrichten Geschichte 
zu erstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des étudiants seront guidés pour penser en critique aux 
nouvelles, pour développer leurs propres critères pour évaluer 
les éléments d'une histoire intéressante, pour rassembler des 
données sur les nouvelles locales et pour créer leur propre histoire
de nouvelles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes serão guiados para pensar crìticamente 
sobre a notícia, para desenvolver seus próprios critérios para 
avaliar os elementos de uma história newsworthy, para coletar dados 
na notícia local e para criar sua própria história da notícia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi saranno guidati per pensare criticamente alle 
notizie, per sviluppare i loro propri test di verifica per valutare 
gli elementi di una storia newsworthy, per raccogliere i dati sulle 
notizie locali e per creare la loro propria storia di notizie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα καθοδηγηθούν για να σκεφτούν αυστηρά 
για τις ειδήσεις, να ορίσουν τα κριτήριά τους για να αξιολογήσουν
τα στοιχεία μιας γενικού ενδιαφέροντος ιστορίας, να συλλέξουν τα 
στοιχεία όσον αφορά τις τοπικές ειδήσεις και να δημιουργήσουν 
την ιστορία ειδήσεών τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dirigirán a los estudiantes para pensar críticamente de 
las noticias, para desarrollar sus propios criterios para evaluar los 
elementos de una historia newsworthy, para recoger datos sobre las 
noticias locales y para crear su propia historia de las noticias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205342</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105879</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

      <location>
